details.title: Parameter estimation for Pareto and K distributed clutter with noise

authors.affiliation: Defence Science and Technology Organisation, Australia
authors.name: Stephen Bocquet

details.abstract: The form of the z log z estimator is derived for both Pareto and K distributed clutter plus noise. When noise is included, numerical zero finding is required to obtain the shape parameter from the estimator, but it still provides a robust and accurate method that is relatively quick to compute. It is compared with two other methods. The method of moments is the simplest and fastest to compute, but less accurate than other methods if the clutter shape parameter is small. A constrained maximum-likelihood (ML) estimator is constructed by maximising the log likelihood function in one dimension to find the shape parameter, while holding the mean power and clutter to noise ratio constant. This estimator is robust and accurate, but relatively slow because numerical integration is required to calculate the likelihood function, along with numerical optimisation to find the maximum. If the noise power is unknown, it can be obtained using the first two intensity moments in combination with either the constrained ML or z log z estimator. These combinations provide more robust and accurate estimates than the third intensity moment.

ieee.title: Analysis of X-Band SAR Sea-Clutter Distributions at Different Grazing Angles
ieee.displayText: Anthony Fiche, Sébastien Angelliaume, Luke Rosenberg, Ali Khenchaf, "Analysis of X-Band SAR Sea-Clutter Distributions at Different Grazing Angles", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 53, pp. 4650-4660, 2015, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: The potential of 2D wavelet transforms for target detection in sea-clutter
ieee.displayText: Vichet Duk, Brian Ng, Luke Rosenberg, "The potential of 2D wavelet transforms for target detection in sea-clutter", Radar Conference (RadarCon) 2015 IEEE, pp. 0901-0906, 2015.

ieee.title: K-clutter plus noise parameter estimation using fractional positive and negative moments
ieee.displayText: Amar Mezache, Izzeddine Chalabi, Toufik Laroussi, Mohamed Sahed, "K-clutter plus noise parameter estimation using fractional positive and negative moments", Aerospace and Electronic Systems IEEE Transactions on, vol. 52, pp. 960-967, 2016, ISSN 0018-9251.

ieee.title: Characterisation of the Ingara HGA dataset
ieee.displayText: Luke Rosenberg, Simon Watts, Stephen Bocquet, Matthew Ritchie, "Characterisation of the Ingara HGA dataset", Radar Conference (RadarCon) 2015 IEEE, pp. 0027-0032, 2015.

ieee.title: Comparison of distributions for real and synthetic aperture sea-clutter
ieee.displayText: Luke Rosenberg, Sébastien Angelliaume, Anthony Fiche, "Comparison of distributions for real and synthetic aperture sea-clutter", Radar Conference 2015 IEEE, pp. 115-120, 2015.
